content: The Refined Iron Sand is one of the basic materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game, mostly for weapons and crafting new staff variants.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Refined_Iron_Sand.md', within the main section titled 'Refined Iron Sand'.
The content is as follows:
The Refined Iron Sand is one of the basic materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game, mostly for weapons and crafting new staff variants.
